chapter.title: What is Hackedbox?
chapter.para: Hackedbox is a stripped down version of Blackbox - The X11 Window Manager (). The toolbar and Slit have been removed. The goal of Hackedbox is to be a small "feature-set" window manager, with no bloat. There are no plans to add any functionality, only bugfixes and speed enhancements whenever possible.

chapter.title: Downloading and Installing
chapter.para: Hackedbox is only available in source form. Package submissions are welcome. Please submit them to larry@scrudgeware.org.
